name: Organic Cotton T-Shirt
description: This t-shirt is made from 100% organic cotton grown without pesticides. It's soft, breathable, and perfect for everyday wear. Certified by GOTS for sustainability.

reviews.comment: Great quality and fits perfectly. Love the eco-friendly aspect!
Sustainable and stylish. Worth every penny.
Comfortable, but could have more color options.

name: Bamboo Toothbrush Set
description: Pack of 4 biodegradable bamboo toothbrushes with soft bristles. Reduces plastic waste and is compostable after use.

reviews.comment: Feels great and eco-friendly. My family loves them.
Best switch from plastic. Highly recommend.

name: Solar-Powered Charger
description: Portable solar charger with 10000mAh battery. Charges phones and tablets using renewable solar energy. Waterproof and durable for outdoor use.

reviews.comment: Works well in sunlight, but slower in cloudy weather.

name: Reusable Stainless Steel Straw Kit
description: Set of 4 stainless steel straws with cleaning brush and carrying case. Dishwasher safe and eliminates single-use plastic.

reviews.comment: Sturdy and easy to clean. Great for on-the-go.

name: Organic Hemp Backpack
description: Durable backpack made from organic hemp fabric. Spacious compartments, water-resistant, and ethically produced.

reviews.comment: Comfortable straps and lots of space.
Eco-friendly and stylish for daily use.
Good, but zipper could be smoother.

name: LED Energy-Saving Bulbs Pack
description: Pack of 6 LED bulbs that use 80% less energy than incandescent. Long-lasting up to 25,000 hours.

reviews.comment: Bright and saves on electricity bills.

name: Compostable Coffee Pods
description: Box of 20 compostable pods filled with organic fair-trade coffee. Compatible with most machines.

reviews.comment: Good flavor, pods break down quickly.

name: Recycled Paper Notebook
description: A5 notebook with 100 pages of 100% recycled paper. Spiral-bound for easy use.

name: Bamboo Cutting Board
description: Large bamboo cutting board that's naturally antibacterial and easy to clean.

name: Eco-Friendly Yoga Mat
description: Non-slip yoga mat made from natural rubber and cork. Biodegradable and free from harmful chemicals.
